original_text: I have surely built thee an house to dwell in, a settled place for thee to abide in for ever.
korean_text: 내가 참으로 주를 위하여 계실 성전을 건축하였사오니 주께서 영원히 계실 처소로소이다 하고

sentences.original_text: I have surely built thee an house to dwell in
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 위해 거주할 집을 분명히 지었노라

sentences.original_text: a settled place for thee to abide in for ever
